headline: NRG Energy Honors Trailblazers at 6th Annual Excellence in Energy Awards
summary: HOUSTON, November 13, 2025--NRG Energy, Inc. (NYSE: NRG) proudly recognized a group of outstanding business customers today for their leadership in advancing sustainability, community impact and energy efficiency during the company’s sixth annual Excellence in Energy Awards.
